DOC.brief_summary: This randomize placebo-controlled trial test whether supplement vitamin C E low marker inflammation oxidative stress healthy adult . We examine whether one antioxidant vitamin effective another , whether gender body fat influence treatment effect . We also determine whether gender , body fat , menopausal status associate baseline concentration inflammation oxidative stress marker .
DOC.brief_title: Gender , Obesity , C-Reactive Protein , Oxidative Stress
DOC.detailed_description: Participants give 1000 mg vitamin C 800 IU vitamin E daily 60 day .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Nonsmoker passively expose Males female 18 year older Able take vitamin supplement Able take acetominophen instead aspirin NSAIDs study Exclusion criterion : Pregnancy lactation History ever smoke passive smoke exposure last year Active liver disease ; history HIV/AIDS , diabetes , kidney stone , hemochromatosis , autoimmune disease ; heart disease , stroke , cancer last 5 year User prescribe antiinflammatory lipidlowering medication , oral contraceptive , hormone replacement therapy , bloodthinning drug User iron supplement vitamin E 600 IU per day Consumption 2 alcoholic beverage per day
